授業目的: The purpose of this course is for students to learn the academic writing process and develop their writing through the completion of a descriptive 5 paragraph essay.
到達目標:
Students will be able to …
• Develop organized and structured writing
• Create New, Interesting, Specific writing
• Write effective topic sentences and thesis statements
• Write well-developed body paragraphs supported with examples and explanations
• Plan and write different essay types
• Reflect on your own writing and provide peer feedback
• Paraphrase, summarize information
• Cite and reference sources, APA style
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業の概要・背景:
• Develop freewriting skills through blogs
• Learn and practice writing through mini workshops
• Exchange and develop ideas with classmates
• Create a five paragraph “descriptive” essay
授業方法: This course will use a variety of learning activities ranging from lectures, discussions, presentations, pair work, and group work.

第2回: What is academic writing? Choosing a topic.
第12回: WRITE body 1, 2, 3, thesis statement, introduction, conclusion
トピック.授業計画1: The semester will focus on the development of a five paragraph, “descriptive” essay.
トピック.授業外学習2: Homework will consist of blog writing and essay development.
